        Gets raw data from pre-defined values
        Parameters:
        type - type of data
        cell - number of cell broadcasting value
        segment - number of segment broadcasting value
        value - value of cell of segment
        Returns:
        raw data from pre-defined values

        Returns:

                                                       Segment[] segments)
        Finds number of segment of bms device
        Parameters:
        bmsDevice - # of bms device
        segments - list of segments to look into

      • generateBmsDevicePositions

        public static BmsDevicePosition[] generateBmsDevicePositions(int totalBmsDevices,
                                                             Segment[] segments)
        Finds position of each bms device in segments
        Parameters:
        totalBmsDevices - total number of bms devices
        segments - segments to look into
        Returns:
        list of positions (each position is relative to one device)

      • createSegments

        public static Segment[] createSegments(int[] numberOfBmsPerSegment,
                                       int numberOfCellsPerBms)
        Creates list of segments for pack
        Parameters:
        numberOfBmsPerSegment - # cell in each segment
        numberOfCellsPerBms - # cells controlled by each bms
        Returns:
        list of segments

      • createBmsDevices

        public static BmsDevice[] createBmsDevices(int numberOfCells,
                                           int numberOfCellsPerBms)
        Creates list of bms devices for segment
        Parameters:
        numberOfCells - # cell in segment to be controlled by bms devices
        numberOfCellsPerBms - # cells controlled by each bms device
        Returns:
        list of bms devices for segment
